Question: Speed up clothes ironing.
Choices: (A) Wrap ironing board with saran wrap. (B) Wrap ironing board with foil.

Wrapping the ironing board with saran wrap or foil would not have any significant impact on the speed of ironing clothes. In fact, it may even make the process more difficult as the surface of the board would become slippery and the foil may even cause wrinkles on the clothes. To speed up clothes ironing, one can use a higher heat setting on the iron, use a steam iron, or invest in a more efficient ironing board with a larger surface area. Additionally, organizing clothes by fabric type and ironing them in batches can also save time.

While wrapping the ironing board with saran wrap may not have any significant impact on the speed of ironing clothes, wrapping it with foil can reflect heat back onto the clothing, effectively ironing both sides at once and saving time.
